message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than to others. I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1,400,000.  What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  Given the value to me, I'm willing to pay $1,200,000.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept. Let's meet in the middle â€“ how about $1,350,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. I'm still not quite there yet, but I'm willing to go up to $1,300,000. Let's see if we can close this deal.
